Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Dermaseptin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry P84923]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, Enterococcus faecalis;Gram-neagtive bacterium:Pseudomonas aeruginosa;Fungi:Candida albicans and Paracoccidioides brasiliensis.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:PubMed ID is not available]100% hemolytic activity at 128 Âµg/ml
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide, active against the Gram-positive bacterium S. aureus, the Gram-negative bacteria E. coli and P. aeruginosa, and the yeasts C. albicans and P. brasiliensis. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Dermaseptins and phylloseptins from Phyllomedusa tarsius (Amphibia).
Literature.Author: Prates M.V, Jardim D.P, Silva L.P, Gordo M, Leite J.R.S.A, Figueredo R.C.R, Amaral A.C, Felipe M.S.S, Bloch C. Jr.
